text: 'Need IPv4 space for your next expansion. You can leverage a block of our legacy IPv4 space with a simple annual contract term. Options to renew will help guarantee IPv4 availability during the world wide transition to IPv6. We have small cloud blocks /29, /28, /27, /26 available for your Equinix Cloud IPv4 space needs. This is one of the few places you can obtain the small space you need for such connectivity. A special online rental form tailored to the Equinix Cloud IPv4 space need which can be found on RentIPv4.com . Sales@RentIPv4.com.
